00278 /***********************/
00279 /* Set Node Attributes */
00280 /***********************/
00281 
00282 /* The following node attributes cannot be changed once the node is created
00283    - NodeClass
00284    - NodeId
00285    - Symmetric
00286    
00287    The following attributes will eventually be managed by a userrights layer and are unsupported yet
00288    - WriteMask
00289    - UserWriteMask
00290    - AccessLevel
00291    - UserAccessLevel
00292    - UserExecutable
00293 
00294    The following attributes are currently taken from the value variant:
00295    - DataType
00296    - ValueRank
00297    - ArrayDimensions
00298    
00299    - Historizing is currently unsupported
00300   */
00301 
00302 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00303 UA_Server_setNodeAttribute_value(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId nodeId,
00304                                  const UA_DataType *type, const UA_Variant *value);
00305 
00306 /* The value is moved into the node (not copied). The value variant is _inited internally. */
00307 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00308 UA_Server_setNodeAttribute_value_destructive(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId nodeId,
00309                                              const UA_DataType *type, UA_Variant *value);

00311 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00312 UA_Server_setNodeAttribute_value_dataSource(UA_Server *server, UA_NodeId nodeId, UA_DataSource dataSource);

00360 /***********************/
00361 /* Get Node Attributes */
00362 /***********************/
00363 
00364 /* The following attributes cannot be read. They make no sense to read internally since the "admin"
00365    user always has all rights.
00366    - UserWriteMask
00367    - UserAccessLevel
00368    - UserExecutable
00369 */
00370 
00371 /* Don't use this function. There are typed versions for every supported attribute. */
00372 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00373 UA_Server_getNodeAttribute(UA_Server *server, UA_NodeId nodeId, UA_AttributeId attributeId, void *v);

00460 typedef struct {
00461     enum {
00462         UA_JOBTYPE_NOTHING,
00463         UA_JOBTYPE_DETACHCONNECTION,
00464         UA_JOBTYPE_BINARYMESSAGE,
00465         UA_JOBTYPE_METHODCALL,
00466         UA_JOBTYPE_DELAYEDMETHODCALL,
00467     } type;
00468     union {
00469         UA_Connection *closeConnection;
00470         struct {
00471             UA_Connection *connection;
00472             UA_ByteString message;
00473         } binaryMessage;
00474         struct {
00475             void *data;
00476             void (*method)(UA_Server *server, void *data);
00477         } methodCall;
00478     } job;
00479 } UA_Job;
00480

00542 
00552     UA_Int32 (*stop)(struct UA_ServerNetworkLayer *nl, UA_Job **jobs);
